code: import React from"react";import{Button,ButtonGroup}from"react-bootstrap";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{getUserProfile,vote}from"../../actions/userActions";import{Thumbsup,Thumbsdown}from"../../layouts/icons";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Vote(props){var dispatch=useDispatch();var voteUser=function voteUser(status){var postData={status:status};dispatch(vote(props.userId,postData)).then(function(){dispatch(getUserProfile(props.username));});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ButtonGroup,{className:"vote_btnGroup gap-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Button,{variant:"primary",onClick:function onClick(){voteUser(1);},className:props.voteStatus==="UPVOTE"?"user_vote":"",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Thumbsup,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"visually-hidden",children:"up vote"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Button,{className:props.voteStatus==="DOWNVOTE"?"user_vote":"",variant:"primary",onClick:function onClick(){voteUser(-1);},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Thumbsdown,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"visually-hidden",children:"down vote"})]})]});}export default Vote;
